sentences.en: At what temperature does sugar crystallize?
Experiments show that Fe 2 O 3 of low silicon iron tailings can't effectively crystallize the whole glass.
sentences.cn: 实验表明,以低硅铁尾矿中的Fe2O3作为晶核剂不能有效使玻璃整体晶化.

sentences.en: Gypsum may crystallize on the surface of the phosphate rock particles.
sentences.cn: 石膏会在磷矿颗粒的表面上结晶.

sentences.en: He tried to crystallize his thoughts.
sentences.cn: 他试图使他的思想明确.

sentences.en: Reading your book helped crystallize my views.
sentences.cn: 我阅读你的着作有助于澄清我的思想.

sentences.en: She is trying to crystallize her thoughts.
sentences.cn: 她试图把自己的想法具体化.

sentences.en: Suitable for the gaseous or liquid media that will not crystallize 、 solidify or corrode the stainless steel.
sentences.cn: 适用于测量不结晶、不凝固、对不锈钢不起腐蚀作用的液体、气体的压力.

sentences.en: The following chart attempts to crystallize the history of cataloguing.
sentences.cn: 下表中将试图具体列出编目史实.
这液体在摄氏五十度会晶化.

sentences.en: The liquid will crystallize at 50 degrees centigrade.
sentences.cn: 这种液体在50摄氏度时结晶。

sentences.en: The pure compound tends to crystallize systematically into cubic form.
sentences.cn: 纯化合物倾向于系统地结晶成立方形状.

sentences.en: The syrup began to crystallize once it cooled down.
sentences.cn: 糖浆冷却的时候就会开始结晶.

sentences.en: They crystallize collective and arduous wisdom and labor, through fair - spoken turn oneself into working outstanding achievement.
sentences.cn: 他们把集体辛勤智慧和劳动结晶, 通过花言巧语变成自己工作业绩.

sentences.en: Thirdly, electronic trading networks themselves crystallize this power imbalance.
sentences.cn: 第三, 电子贸易网路本身使这个不平衡.

sentences.en: Those with a Grand Square in the natal chart crystallize much very early.
sentences.cn: 个人命盘中拥有四分相的那些人在很小的时候就显示出了.

sentences.en: With each step , the pieces of this post crystallize in my head.
sentences.cn: 跑步时, 这些思想在我头脑集结.

words.tran_cn: 结晶，晶体；水晶；水晶饰品
结晶，形成结晶；明确；具体化
使结晶；明确；使具体化；做成蜜饯

trans.tran_cn: 结晶； 变得清晰而明确； 使具体化
trans.tran_en: if a liquid crystallizes, it forms  crystals

trans.tran_cn: 使结晶，使成形，使具体化，明确，包糖，涂糖霜
